response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to you is $8,000. Considering its true market value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price allows us to maintain a fair profit while ensuring you receive a high-quality product at an attractive cost. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 9500}
